import React, { useState,Component } from "react"; // import React, { Component } from 'react'; import * as emailjs from 'emailjs-com'; // import Layout from '../components/layout' // import { Button, FormFeedback, Form, FormGroup, Label, Input } from 'reactstrap'; class Contact extends Component { state = { name: '', email: '', subject: '', message: '', } handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault() const { name, email, subject, message } = this.state let templateParams = { from_name: email, to_name: '', subject: subject, message_html: message, } emailjs.send( 'gmail', 'template_lKszXeAY', templateParams, 'user_WpIipRK3m1YnP0EWF3VVy' ) this.resetForm() } resetForm() { this.setState({ name: '', email: '', subject: '', message: '', }) } handleChange = (param, e) => { this.setState({ [param]: e.target.value }) } render() { return ( <>

Contact Us

) } } export default Contact;
